name: Mechanist
description: The Mechanist is a medium humanoid known for its proficiency with mechanical devices and tools, often depicted as a skilled artisan or engineer. It is adept in combat, manipulating constructs and gadgets to gain a tactical advantage.
memorable: Its ability to produce Constructs that can aid in combat and its vast knowledge in tinkering tools set it apart.
goals: To support allies through mechanical inventions and to excel in battles using constructs and tools.
relations: Mechanists may command small Constructs and often work alongside other mechanical entities or artisans.
environment: Typically found in workshops, battlefields, or areas where technology and machinery are present.
strengths: Exceptional intelligence grants it double proficiency with tinker tools, making it a powerful engineer and combat support.
weaknesses: Moderate physical strength and charisma, limiting direct confrontations and social interactions.
attacks: Utilizes melee attacks with a Warhammer and ranged attacks with a Light Crossbow, effective both in close and ranged combat.
most_powerful_ability: Quick Creation allows it to create Constructs that follow its commands, adding tactical options in battle.
senses: Normal senses with a perception score of 10.
skills: Proficient with tinker tools, enhancing its ability to repair and create mechanical devices.
additional_information: Can restore hit points to friendly Constructs through Repair ability.
Releases a magnetic pulse to disorient attackers using metal weapons.
Capable of multiattacks to increase damage output.
Creates tiny Constructs that provide additional tactical support.
Strikes a balance between combat effectiveness and mechanical ingenuity.
